org.rapla.mobile.android.activity

Class EventDetailsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.BaseActivity
        • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.EventDetailsActivity

  • public class EventDetailsActivity
extends BaseActivity
    This screen shows the basic data of a reservation. The user can modify the reservation data. The screen allows the user to jump to allocation screen and appointment screen.
    Author:
    Patrick Zorn

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  EventDetailsActivity.ButtonListener
      This class handles click events on button save, cancel, allocations, appointments.
      class  EventDetailsActivity.CancelDialogListener
      CancelDialogListener This class handles the event that the user clicked on 'Cancel'
      static class  EventDetailsActivity.DialogConfirmDeleteListener
      Listener for the ok button of the confirm delete reservation dialog.
      static class  EventDetailsActivity.EventTypeItemSelectedListener
      Listener class for the event type selecion to update the list view with dynamic attributes based on the selected dynamic type

      • initEventTypes

        public void initEventTypes(Spinner eventtype)
        This method initializes the spinner ui (drop-down element for event types). Therefore it reads all existing event type names from the facade and adds every one to the spinner adapter.
        Parameters:
        eventtype - stands for the spinner object

      • setSelectedEventType

        public void setSelectedEventType(org.rapla.entities.dynamictype.DynamicType eventType)
        This method preselects the correct event type on the spinner ui element (drop-down element for event types).
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event type to be set on the spinner
